questions.question: What does HTML stand for?
questions.explanation: HTML stands for Hyper Text Markup Language, which is the standard markup language for creating web pages.

questions.question: Which CSS property is used to change text color?
questions.explanation: The 'color' property is used to set the color of text in CSS.
